BRIEF-Mittleman Brothers Comments On Aimia Inc Special Meeting

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 08:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mittleman Brothers Comments On Aimia Inc Special Meeting Oct 15 (Reuters) - Aimia Inc : * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS COMMENTS ON AIMIA INC SPECIAL MEETING * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - OWNING OR EXERCISING CONTROL OVER MORE THAN 23% OF AIMIA SHARES * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - WILL SEEK TO ENGAGE WITH REQUISITIONING SHAREHOLDERS NOMINEES AS SOON AS THEIR INFORMATION CIRCULAR IS MAILED * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - BASED ON INITIAL REVIEW OF REQUISITIONING SHAREHOLDERS NOMINEES, FIND THEM QUALIFIED TO SERVE AS AIMIA'S DIRECTORS * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - PREPARED TO TAKE ALL NECESSARY ACTION TO PREVENT AIMIA SHAREHOLDERS' "VOTING RIGHTS FROM BEING INFRINGED" * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - REQUESTED THAT UNTIL AFTER MEETING IS HELD ,COMPOSITION OF AIMIA'S BOARD IS DETERMINED, THAT TSX MONITOR ANY PROPOSAL BY AIMIA * MITTLEMAN BROTHERS - REMAINS COMMITTED TO ASSISTING AIMIA IN "IMPROVING VALUE" FOR ALL STAKEHOLDERS
